entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Vancouver
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:03 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, 7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vancouver Int'l Airport 02:00 AM PST Tuesday 27 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: 7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 7.1°C
Wind: ENE 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Rain beginning this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Rain. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h except gusting to 60 near the Strait of Georgia late in the morning and early afternoon. Temperature steady near 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the evening then southeast 20 before morning. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
